original_title: Salve-Se Quem Puder - O Rally da Juventude
overview: A millionaire Aníbal sponsor a car racing, the "Youth's Rally". A couple, Helena and Fernando, want to be part of the competition but after a fight between both, they decide to compete in a team only with men and another one with women.
title: Salve-Se Quem Puder - O Rally da Juventude
